question:
[Jonathan]'s wife [Cristina] bought him a watch [Nichole] and her sister, [Pennie], frequently bicker. However, they always make up quickly. [Cristina] loves cooking for her son. His name is [William] [Evelyn] spent a great day shopping with her daughter, [Pennie]. [Nichole] and her uncle [Jonathan] went to the pet shop. [Nichole] saw a puppy that she loved, so [Jonathan] bought it for her.
Question: How is [William] related to [Evelyn]?
